mutants.original_line: k = reduce(lambda x, y: x * y // gcd(x, y), M)
mutants.mutated_line: k = reduce(lambda x, y: x * y / gcd(x, y), M)

mutants.mutated_line: k = reduce(lambda x, y: x * y * gcd(x, y), M)

mutants.mutated_line: k = reduce(lambda x, y: x / y // gcd(x, y), M)

mutants.original_line: k = reduce(lambda x, y: x * y // gcd(x, y), M)
mutants.mutated_line: k = reduce(lambda x, y: (x + y) // gcd(x, y), M)
